Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>The road gets slippery in the rain,
so be careful.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal>What's the matter, buddy? Didn't you
hear I said you're suspicious? Don't you
know what that word means?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, you're not? Then I'll give you the
gatekeeper's greeting!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>Uh...how did it go again?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, right! Then I should let you know
about the village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Uh...one sec.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I only need to stay on guard duty
while it's light out. My mom takes over
at night.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Mom's kind of a scaredy-cat, so I hope she's
cut out to be a guard.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey there, traveler! You've come to
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, home of fine produce
and dyed goods!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sleep>*snore* Don't worry, Dad... <sp:5:0:0>I'll keep the
village safe...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're up early, buddy. I wake up early
every day too, so I can start guard duty!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since my dad works far away, I make sure
to guard the village every day.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>They say even monsters need their sleep.
That's why I'm OK standing down at night.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Do you know Ms. Zelda? She's really a
princess, but she started a <clr:0000>school <clr:ffff>right
here in our village!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>But folks say they don't know where
she is now.<sp:0:4:0>That's why my dad quit bein' a guard at
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> to go search for Ms. Zelda
at a place called Lookout Landing.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>But don't worry! Me and my mom are
handling guard duty just fine!
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's some stores and a dyed-goods
place on the busy street.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I work here as a guard, but there's no
suspicious folks in Hateno Village anyway,
so you can relax and take it easy!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you don't know where a store you're
trying to find is, follow old man Seldon!<sp:0:4:0>He's this huge guy who wanders around
the village all the time.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I work here as a guard, but there's no
suspicious folks in Hateno Village anyway,
so you can relax and take it easy!
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We mostly grow veggies in <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>,
but we also have lots of cows!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>The barn <clr:ffff>is on top of the hill, so it's kinda
far from here, but I love that place!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I work here as a guard, but there's no
suspicious folks in Hateno Village anyway,
so you can relax and take it easy!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Seeya. I need to hurry and relieve Mom
on guard duty!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Huh? You're suspicious? <sp:5:1:0>Y...y...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Yippee! You're the first actually
suspicious guy I've met! I could tell
as soon as I saw you!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Oh, but I'm not supposed to talk to the
suspicious ones.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>No one wanders into other people's
houses if they're not suspicious, mister!<sp:0:4:0>That doesn't happen here! Not in my
village, anyway!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It takes real concentration to do guard
duty while it's raining!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You've come to <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, home of
fine produce and dyed goods!<sp:0:4:0>Our <clr:0000>vegetables<clr:ffff> are the best around, and
we're at the four fronts of <clr:0000>fashion<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Did I say that right? <sp:5:0:0>My dad would've known.<sp:5:0:0>
Too bad he's still at Lookout Landing.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>You again, mister?! This gets more
suspicious every time!<sp:0:4:0>I'm not gonna let you mess with my
house or my family while Dad's away at
Lookout Landing!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>My dad told me not to talk to any
suspicious folks, and that means you.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh...you're not suspicious? You're just
a traveler? No fooling?<sp:0:4:0>Hmm. I guess that's OK. <sp:5:0:0>My dad always
said to be nice to travelers.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? You're not suspicious after all?<sp:5:0:0>
Then I'll give you the gatekeeper's
greeting.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Uh...how did it go again?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>That's right, I remember you now!
The suspicious guy!<sp:0:4:0>I knew you seemed as suspicious as the
last time we met!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh, but I'm not supposed to talk to the
suspicious ones.
